frame.name: Becoming_dry
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Entity</fen> loses moisture with the outcome of being in a dry state.
<ex><fex name="Entity">The slab</fex> <t>dries</t> <fex name="Manner">very quickly</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Entity
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Entity</fen> is the thing that loses moisture and becomes dry.</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>The intensity with which the <fen>Entity</fen> becomes dry.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>The way in which the <fen>Entity</fen> becomes dry.</def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>The situation in which the <fex name="Entity">Entity</fex> is becoming dry.</def-root>

FE.name: Concessive
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE signifies that the state of affairs expressed by the main clause (containing the target) occurs or holds, and something other than that state of affairs would be expected given the state of affairs in the concessive clause. </def-root>

FE.name: Particular_iteration
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE indicates that the visiting is a particular instance in a series of repeated visiting events.</def-root>
